name: @saekitominaga/customelements-input-file-preview
description: Show preview with `<input type=file>` by Custom Elements.
author: Saeki Tominaga

scripts._build:compress: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/InputFilePreview.js -- brotlin compress dist/InputFilePreview.js -m 1
scripts._build:minify: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/InputFilePreview.js -- terser dist/InputFilePreview.js -o dist/InputFilePreview.min.js -c ecma=2020 --mangle --ecma 2020 --module --source-map content='dist/InputFilePreview.js.map',filename='InputFilePreview.js',includeSources,url='InputFilePreview.min.js.map'
scripts._build:minify-compress: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/InputFilePreview.min.js -- brotlin compress dist/InputFilePreview.min.js -m 1
scripts._build:minify-declaration: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/InputFilePreview.d.ts -- cpy dist/InputFilePreview.d.ts dist --rename=InputFilePreview.min.d.ts
